## Solution 3

```{r}
cbp_health_care_by_state <- cbp_health_care %>%
  group_by(FIPSTATE, FIPSCTY) %>%
  summarize(EMP = sum(EMP)) %>%
  summarize(EMP = sum(EMP), counties = n())
```

## Solution 4

```{r}
group_by(animals, species_id, month) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  spread(key = month, value = count, fill = 0)
```
